    1: from typing import List, TypeVar
    2: 
    3: T = TypeVar("T")
    4: 
    5: 
    6: class Stack(List[T]):
    7:     """A small shim over builtin list."""
    8: 
    9:     @property
   10:     def top(self) -> T:
   11:         """Get top of stack."""
   12:         return self[-1]
   13: 
   14:     def push(self, item: T) -> None:
   15:         """Push an item on to the stack (append in stack nomenclature)."""
   16:         self.append(item)
